title: Follow live: Titans take Cam Ward No. 1, Jaguars trade up for Travis Hunter at No. 2
description: Track every pick from Round 1, including live reaction and analysis. Watch the draft live on ESPN, ABC and ESPN+.

title: Follow live: Knicks head to Detroit for pivotal Game 3
Four-time Crucible champion Selby suffers shock loss
description: Four-time winner Mark Selby suffers a shock first-round loss at the World Championship as Ben Woollaston secures a superb victory in a late-night Crucible finish.

title: 'My father thinks I'm a disgrace' - Eubank reveals pain
description: Chris Eubank Jr opens up on the pain of his estranged relationship with his father at a news conference.

title: 2025 NFL Draft: Saints pass on Shedeur Sanders, Jaxson Dart and other QBs for Texas OL Kelvin Banks Jr.
description: The Saints weren't going to reach on a quarterback at No. 9 overall.
author: Frank Schwab

title: Cub Swanson to coach old foe Giga Chikadze at UFC on ESPN 66 in 'full circle' moment
description: UFC legend Cub Swanson recalls being crushed by his loss to Giga Chikadze, but Saturday he will serve as his coach.

title: 'What is pain?' Eubank silences Benn press conference
description: Chris Eubank Jr and Conor Benn faced one another at the final press conference ahead of Saturday's clash live on Sky Sports Box Office.

title: 'Our greatest ever player' - Vardy to leave Leicester
description: Jamie Vardy will leave already-relegated Leicester City this summer after 13 years at the club, but has no plans to retire from football.
